Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.opensaml.soap.wssecurity.AttributedDateTime.DEFAULT_DATETIME_FORMAT
    replaced by use of a DateTimeFormatter configured via AttributedDateTime.setDateTimeFormatter(DateTimeFormatter).
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.opensaml.soap.util.SOAPSupport.addHeaderBlock(MessageContext, XMLObject)
    use SOAPMessagingSupport.addHeaderBlock(MessageContext, XMLObject)
    org.opensaml.soap.util.SOAPSupport.addSOAP11HeaderBlock(Envelope, XMLObject)
    use SOAPMessagingSupport.addSOAP11HeaderBlock(Envelope, XMLObject)
    org.opensaml.soap.client.http.AbstractPipelineHttpSOAPClient.checkTLSCredentialTrusted(HttpClientContext, HttpUriRequest)
    use HttpClientSecuritySupport.checkTLSCredentialEvaluated(HttpClientContext, String)
    org.opensaml.soap.util.SOAPSupport.getInboundHeaderBlock(MessageContext, QName, Set<String>, boolean)
    use SOAPMessagingSupport.getInboundHeaderBlock(MessageContext, QName)
    org.opensaml.soap.util.SOAPSupport.getSOAP11HeaderBlock(Envelope, QName, Set<String>, boolean)
    use SOAPMessagingSupport.getSOAP11HeaderBlock(Envelope, QName, Set, boolean)
    org.opensaml.soap.util.SOAPSupport.isSOAP11HeaderTargetedToNode(XMLObject, Set<String>, boolean)
    use SOAPMessagingSupport.isSOAP11HeaderTargetedToNode(XMLObject, Set, boolean)
    org.opensaml.soap.util.SOAPSupport.isSOAPMessage(MessageContext<? extends XMLObject>)
    use SOAPMessagingSupport.isSOAPMessage(MessageContext)
